scoringSystem.compliance: If any mandatory rule = FAIL → page NON-COMPLIANT

rules.text: Use Tailwind's responsive breakpoints (`sm`, `md`, `lg`, `xl`, `2xl`) to ensure layouts adapt across mobile, tablet, desktop, and large screens
Avoid `overflow-x-auto` on body layouts unless intentional; ensure grids/flex wrap correctly
Apply consistent Tailwind spacing scale (`p-4`, `m-8`, multiples of 4) throughout
Use `space-y-*` and `space-x-*` utilities for balanced whitespace that enhances readability
Establish hierarchy via `text-2xl font-bold` (primary), `text-lg font-medium` (secondary), `text-base` (tertiary)
Headings use consistent Tailwind typography classes (`text-xl`, `font-semibold`)
Highlight CTAs with emphasis utilities: `bg-primary text-white rounded-lg shadow`
Use `hidden`, `collapse`, or Headless UI/Tailwind components (accordions, tabs, drawers) for progressive disclosure
Use fluid typography with arbitrary values `text-[clamp(1rem,4vw,2rem)]` for responsive scaling
Apply different spacing patterns: `space-y-2` for lists, `space-y-6` for sections, `space-y-12` for major content blocks
Use CSS Grid with `grid-cols-[repeat(auto-fit,minmax(250px,1fr))]` for dashboard/bento box layouts
Implement asymmetrical designs with `grid-template-areas` and varied `col-span-*` classes
Use `sticky top-0 z-10` with proper backgrounds for section headers and navigation
Ensure text colors (`text-gray-900`, `text-white`) vs background meet WCAG 2.2 AA contrast
Define brand palette in `tailwind.config.js` and use semantic classes (`bg-brand`, `text-brand`)
Prefer `bg-gray-900` / `bg-gray-50` instead of pure black/white for modern neutrals
Use Tailwind font stacks (`font-sans`, `font-serif`, `font-mono`) with modern sans-serif or variable fonts
Apply `leading-relaxed` (≥1.5) for body text
Minimum `text-sm` (mobile) and `text-base` (desktop)
Support `dark:` variants with accessible colors (`dark:bg-gray-900`, `dark:text-gray-100`)
Use consistent radii (`rounded-md`, `rounded-lg`, `rounded-2xl`)
Add subtle shadows (`shadow-sm`, `shadow-md`) for elevation
Use Tailwind's `transition`, `duration-200`, `ease-in-out` for smooth interactions (150–400ms)
Ensure consistent use of Tailwind tokens (spacing, colors, typography, radii)
Apply glassmorphism with `backdrop-blur-sm bg-white/20 border border-white/30` for modern overlay effects
Create soft UI with `shadow-[inset_2px_2px_5px_#babecc,inset_-5px_-5px_10px_#fff]` for subtle depth
Use gradient borders `bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500 to-purple-600 p-0.5` and backgrounds for modern appeal
Implement morphing animations with `transform transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out` for state changes
Use variable font optical sizing with `font-variation-settings: 'opsz' auto` for different text sizes
Implement persistent navbars with Tailwind flex/grid layouts
Desktop: `flex-row` nav; Mobile: `fixed bottom-0 flex justify-around` or drawer
Breadcrumbs styled with `text-sm text-gray-500` and `hover:text-gray-700`
Keep primary nav items always visible (`flex gap-6`)
Menu items use `text-sm font-medium`; icons always paired with text
Prominent search bar (`w-full max-w-md border rounded-lg px-4 py-2`)
Active nav links styled with `text-primary border-b-2 border-primary`
Always provide a `Back` or `Home` option styled as secondary action
Use Tailwind variants for states: `hover:bg-`, `focus:ring-`, `active:scale-95`, `disabled:opacity-50`
Provide mobile tap states via `active:bg-gray-200` or ripple micro-interactions
Skeletons: `animate-pulse`; spinners: Tailwind-based loaders
Use color system: `text-green-600` (success), `text-yellow-600` (warning), `text-red-600` (error)
Apply state instantly with `opacity-50 pointer-events-none` until confirmed
Use Tailwind utilities with Headless UI/Framer Motion for swipe, drag, pull-to-refresh
Keyboard navigation visible with `focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary`
Add press depth with `active:translate-y-0.5 active:shadow-sm` for tactile feedback
Implement ripple effects using `relative overflow-hidden` with pseudo-elements for material design feel
Create magnetic buttons with `hover:scale-105 hover:shadow-lg transform transition-all duration-200`
Use gradient fills `bg-gradient-to-r from-transparent via-primary/20 to-transparent` that expand on interaction
Implement varied skeleton patterns: `animate-pulse`, `animate-shimmer`, wave effects for different content types
All interactive elements must support `focus:ring` outlines
Provide `sr-only` skip links (`focus:not-sr-only`)
Use semantic HTML; Tailwind only for styling, not semantics
Icons must have `aria-label` or paired text
Use `motion-safe:` and `motion-reduce:` utilities for animations
Avoid rapid `animate-` classes causing flashing
UI text must be inclusive and readable (`text-base leading-relaxed`)
Group inputs with `space-y-4` or fieldsets
Multi-step wizards styled with `flex gap-2` step indicators
Error messages styled `text-sm text-red-600 mt-1` immediately visible
Errors polite & actionable, displayed with `rounded bg-red-50 p-2`
Always use `label` + `input`; placeholders only for hints
Helper text styled with `text-xs text-gray-500 mt-1`
Buttons/inputs ≥ `h-11 px-4` (`44px` min target)
Maintain `space-y-3` or `gap-4` between interactive elements
Hero: `text-4xl font-bold`, supporting text `text-lg text-gray-600`, CTA `btn-primary`
Use Tailwind image ratios (`aspect-video`, `object-cover`) to support content
Cards with `rounded-lg shadow-sm p-6 bg-white dark:bg-gray-800`
Use `transition`, `hover:scale-105`, `hover:shadow-md` for delight
All sections must have `dark:` styles for accessible dark mode
Style empty states with `text-center py-12 text-gray-500` and supportive illustrations
Error boundaries styled with `bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded-lg p-6 text-center`
Implement progressive image loading with `blur-sm` to `blur-none` transitions
Code blocks use `bg-gray-900 text-gray-100 rounded-lg p-4 font-mono text-sm overflow-x-auto`
Tables beyond overflow: use `hidden md:table-cell` for progressive disclosure and `block md:table` patterns
Timeline/feeds styled with `border-l-2 border-gray-200 pl-4 space-y-6` with relative positioning
Pricing tables use `transform scale-105` for featured plans and `bg-gradient-to-b` for premium emphasis
Parallax sections use `transform translate-y-[var(--scroll)]` with proper `will-change: transform`
Define components with consistent Tailwind patterns and custom plugin classes
Use Tailwind theme tokens (`colors`, `spacing`, `fontFamily`, `borderRadius`)
Respect `dark:`, `motion-reduce:`, and locale settings
Express brand via typography (`font-brand`), imagery, and iconography
Avoid manipulative UI even if styled with Tailwind
Consent forms styled clearly with `p-4 border rounded-lg bg-gray-50`
Sensitive flows use `bg-green-50 border border-green-300` for security reassurance
Auth/logout buttons visible (`text-red-600 hover:text-red-800`)
Forms only request essentials; styled minimally with `space-y-4`
Show purpose in plain text under inputs (`text-sm text-gray-500`)
